name: Cubed (itch) (Monoblanco)
description:
Hello there!

Cubed is a puzzle-platformer where the goal of the game is to reach a portal at the end of the level. It is currently in alpha so there are 10 levels to try out.

The purpose of releasing this alpha is so that I can receive any level designs or ideas that anyone might have. You can go ahead and post a forum topic.

Music in the trailer and game made by Waterflame:

https://www.youtube.com/user/waterflame89
